Le service de réparation d'électroménager d'Action Réparation offre le meilleur rapport qualité / prix dans l'industrie. Il couvre tous les types d'appareil électroménager (laveuse, sécheuse, frigo, lave-vaisselle, four, etc.) de presque toutes les marques. Que votre appareil soit moderne ou plus ancien, nos réparateurs auront une solution définitive et abordable à son problème.

Flash Repair is proud to be the most trusted and reliable appliance repair and appliance installation company throughout the Greater Montreal Area including West Island, Laval, North Shore and the South Shore. We offer a wide range of services for all residential and commercial needs. Proudly providing repair and installation for all home appliances, from fridges, stoves and dishwashers to washers and dryers. Our technicians are fully trained and licensed insuring the quality service that you expect from us. With competitive rates and flexible schedules Flash Repair is always the right choice.
Thank you for choosing us today and it will be a pleasure to continue doing business with you in the future.
